verses.text: O give thanks unto the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*; for he isgood: because his mercy endurethfor ever.
Let Israel now say, that his mercy endurethfor ever.
Let the house of Aaron now say, that his mercy endurethfor ever.
Let them now that fear the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*say, that his mercy endurethfor ever.
I called upon the \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*in distress: the \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*answered me, and set mein a large place.
The \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*ison my side; I will not fear: what can man do unto me?
The \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*taketh my part with them that help me: therefore shall I see my desireupon them that hate me.
It isbetter to trust in the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*than to put confidence in man.
It isbetter to trust in the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*than to put confidence in princes.
All nations compassed me about: but in the name of the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*will I destroy them.
They compassed me about; yea, they compassed me about: but in the name of the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*I will destroy them.
They compassed me about like bees; they are quenched as the fire of thorns: for in the name of the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*I will destroy them.
Thou hast thrust sore at me that I might fall: but the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*helped me.
The \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*ismy strength and song, and is become my salvation.
The voice of rejoicing and salvation isin the tabernacles of the righteous: the right hand of the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*doeth valiantly.
The right hand of the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*is exalted: the right hand of the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*doeth valiantly.
I shall not die, but live, and declare the works of the \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*.
The \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*hath chastened me sore: but he hath not given me over unto death.
Open to me the gates of righteousness: I will go into them, andI will praise the \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*:
This gate of the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, into which the righteous shall enter.
I will praise thee: for thou hast heard me, and art become my salvation.
The stone whichthe builders refused is become the head stoneof the corner.
This is the \+w LORDâ€™s|strong="H3068"\+w*doing; it ismarvellous in our eyes.
This isthe day whichthe \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*hath made; we will rejoice and be glad in it.
Save now, I beseech thee, O \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*: O \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, I beseech thee, send now prosperity.
Blessed behe that cometh in the name of the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*: we have blessed you out of the house of the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*.
God isthe \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, which hath shewed us light: bind the sacrifice with cords, evenunto the horns of the altar.
Thou artmy God, and I will praise thee: thou artmy God, I will exalt thee.
O give thanks unto the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*; for he isgood: for his mercy endurethfor ever.
